Urgent_News_FOMO.template: BREAKING: [fact/stat]. This means [serious implication for jobs/industry].
Urgent_News_FOMO.example: BREAKING: Analysis of 1.5 million ChatGPT conversations shows AI is already reshaping daily workflows—this will change how knowledge workers bill their time.
Yesterday OpenAI released a massive usage study—if these adoption trends hold, teams that ignore AI will lose weeks of productivity.

Urgent_News_FOMO.template: If you're not [adopting/learning/using X], your competitors already are.
Urgent_News_FOMO.example: If you’re not integrating ChatGPT into daily workflows, your competitors who are already using it will outpace you.

Data_Driven_Statistic.example: 30% of consumer ChatGPT usage is work-related. Translation: a third of your peers use it to actually get paid work done.

Data_Driven_Statistic.template: Last year [old stat]. Today [new stat]. The difference: [implication].
Data_Driven_Statistic.example: In Jan 2024, 37% of users had feminine names; by July 2025 that's >50%. The difference: AI adoption is rapidly becoming gender-neutral.

Contrarian_Surprise.example: People think ChatGPT is just for coding — wrong. 75% of usage is practical, everyday tasks.

Contrarian_Surprise.template: Everyone says X. The data shows Y.
Contrarian_Surprise.example: Everyone says AI only helps coders. The data shows it's reshaping everyday productivity for millions.

Micro_Narrative.template: I asked [model/tool] to do [task]. What happened next surprised me.
Micro_Narrative.example: I asked ChatGPT to summarize 100 user conversations — the summary revealed one unexpected way people use AI at work.

Micro_Narrative.template: Company X tried Y; here’s the twist ending.
Micro_Narrative.example: A small NGO used ChatGPT for grant writing — they doubled responses in a month. Here's the trick they used.

Benefit_Opportunity.template: How to get [benefit] in [short time] with [tool].
Benefit_Opportunity.example: How to save 10 hours a week using ChatGPT—3 habits the study shows actually work.

Benefit_Opportunity.template: The fastest way to [desired outcome] with AI.
Benefit_Opportunity.example: The fastest way to turn ChatGPT into a daily productivity assistant (backed by 1.5M convo analysis).

Role_Industry_Specific.template: For [role]: [short hook about how this changes your job].
Role_Industry_Specific.example: For product managers: this ChatGPT study reveals 3 tasks you should stop doing manually.
What ed-tech companies must do after the ChatGPT usage study: rethink tutoring models.

Shock_Sensational.template: This could [big impact claim] — here's the evidence.
Shock_Sensational.example: This study suggests AI could rewrite how entire knowledge industries price labor — here's the evidence.
You won’t believe who’s using ChatGPT most—and why it matters for your hiring strategy.

Question_Reflective.example: Are you ready for AI to change what counts as “work”? The study suggests it already has.
Imagine a world where every employee has an AI co-pilot. The study gives us a glimpse.

Contrast_Old_New.example: Last year, AI adoption was niche. Today, ChatGPT activity is mirroring the adult population.

Contrast_Old_New.template: Before [X] we did [old]. After [X], we do [new].
Contrast_Old_New.example: Before the study, I thought AI adoption was gradual. After reading 1.5M convos, it feels sudden and widespread.

Secret_Curiosity.template: The secret to [benefit] might be [surprising input].
Secret_Curiosity.example: The secret to unlocking your productivity? The patterns hidden in 1.5M ChatGPT conversations.

Secret_Curiosity.template: What they didn't tell you about [topic].
Secret_Curiosity.example: What they didn't tell you about consumer ChatGPT usage: much of the value is non-work, but it's still economic.

Futuristic_Vision.example: In 5 years, AI-driven design tools will create entire product prototypes with minimal human input.

Futuristic_Vision.template: The future of [industry] is being rewritten by [tech].
Futuristic_Vision.example: The future of healthcare is being rewritten by generative AI and real-time diagnostics.

Behind_The_Scenes.template: I discovered how [AI/tool] actually works behind the scenes.
Behind_The_Scenes.example: I discovered how ChatGPT ranks responses internally—and it explains why some answers feel eerily human.

Behind_The_Scenes.template: Here’s what no one tells you about building [tech/product].
Behind_The_Scenes.example: Here’s what no one tells you about building AI-powered recommendation engines—they rely on 3 unseen data tricks.

Challenge_Trend.template: [Popular belief] is being challenged by [new research/finding].
Challenge_Trend.example: The idea that AI will replace all jobs is being challenged by new studies showing it mostly augments human work.

Challenge_Trend.template: Think [common approach] is the only way? Think again.
Challenge_Trend.example: Think deep learning is the only path to AI breakthroughs? Think again—symbolic reasoning is making a comeback.

Tech_Myth_Busting.template: You’ve been told [tech myth] — here’s the truth.
Tech_Myth_Busting.example: You’ve been told AI can’t understand context—here’s the truth: modern models can track subtle intent across paragraphs.

Tech_Myth_Busting.template: Forget what you heard about [tech]. [Contrarian fact].
Tech_Myth_Busting.example: Forget what you heard about generative AI always needing huge datasets. Few-shot learning is changing the game.

Insider_Tip.template: One overlooked trick with [AI/tool] that actually works.
Insider_Tip.example: One overlooked trick with GPT models: prompt chaining can save hours of trial and error.

Insider_Tip.template: How experts are secretly using [tech] to get [result].
Insider_Tip.example: How experts are secretly using LLM embeddings to boost internal search relevance by 40%.

Tech_Human_Collab.template: Here’s how humans and [AI/tool] are teaming up for [benefit].
Tech_Human_Collab.example: Here’s how humans and AI are teaming up to write faster, more engaging marketing content.

Tech_Human_Collab.template: The best results come when [human action] meets [tech].
Tech_Human_Collab.example: The best results come when human intuition meets predictive AI for early fraud detection.

Unexpected_Application.template: [Tech] isn’t just for [common use] — here’s what it’s doing.
Unexpected_Application.example: AI isn’t just for chatbots — it’s now designing molecules for faster drug discovery.

Unexpected_Application.template: You won’t believe how [AI/tool] is being used in [unusual field].
Unexpected_Application.example: You won’t believe how GPT models are being used in archaeology to reconstruct ancient languages.

Data_Frontier.example: New data shows startups using AI in edge computing are raising 3x more funding than last year.
Transformer models now have over 1 trillion parameters. Translation: AI can model human-like reasoning better than ever.
